input.sentences: this weekend we went to a farmers market .
there were very interesting things there .
i kept seeing these weird ceramic statues .
they had a lot of fresh veggies .
output.sentences: We walked through the colorful market.
I purchased a bowl and flowers.
The artist who made the bowl also created vases with similar figures of women.
The market had the most vibrant veggies.
It also had flowers of every color and size wrapped in bundles to be sold.
